title: Indraneel Chakraborty
text:
A software developer and data researcher with a background in Bioinformatics; solving problems using code-first and data-centric approaches on the cloud with DevOps principles!

      


My Works



Project
Description
URL




ClintrialX
R package to fetch and explore clinical trials data from freely available registries and build html interactive reports; Published on CRAN; 4051 CRAN downloads as of February 2026; Cited in Cambridge University Press publication as a related tool.
https://cran.r-project.org/package=clintrialx


30-days-of-pharmaverse
Hands-on exploration of the modern clinical data science stack, designed for programmers and data scientists who want to dive deep into CDISC standards using the R based open-source Pharmaverse ecosystem.
https://github.com/ineelhere/30-days-of-pharmaverse


30DaysOfAI-Streamlit
A Streamlit application exploring Snowflake Cortex AI capabilities as part of the 30 Days of AI Challenge.
https://github.com/ineelhere/30DaysOfAI-Streamlit


shiny.emojirain
Create fun and engaging emoji rain animations in your Shiny applications with this R package; Try it live here!
https://github.com/ineelhere/shiny.emojirain


shiny.ollama
Chat offline with open-source LLMs like deepseek-r1, nemotron, qwen, llama and more all through a simple R package powered by Shiny and Ollama. Published on CRAN.
Development Version (version 0.1.2) - https://github.com/ineelhere/shiny.ollama/  CRAN Release (version 0.1.1) - https://cran.r-project.org/package=shiny.ollama


Building Systems with ChatGPT API
Guide on ChatGPT API integrations
https://ineelhere.github.io/Building-Systems-with-the-ChatGPT-API/


Code With Go
Learn Go with examples
https://ineelhere.gitbook.io/code-with-go/


Curated
Curated learning resources
https://curated.streamlit.app/


India Fights COVID19
COVID-19 dashboard for India
https://indiafightscovid19.streamlit.app/



… and many more.

title: About Me
text:
Hey there! I’m Indraneel from India — a software engineer and data-driven researcher passionate about building things and solving problems. I’ve worked extensively with R, Python, and Bash, leveraging a wide range of tools and technologies to tackle complex challenges.
In R, I specialize in building interactive web applications using {Shiny}, with strong proficiency in the {tidyverse} suite, including {dplyr} for data manipulation and {ggplot2} for data visualization. I’ve developed custom packages like {clintrialx} (clintrialx) and worked with complex datasets such as single-cell sequencing data, utilizing {Seurat} and {Signac}. My expertise extends to implementing reactive programming principles, enabling the creation of user-friendly {Shiny} applications that respond seamlessly to user inputs. Additionally, I have solid experience in package development, testing, and documentation using tools like {testthat}, {pkgdown}, {devtools}, and {roxygen2}.
In Python, I’ve worked with popular libraries like Pandas for data manipulation, Matplotlib and Plotly for data visualization, and Streamlit for building interactive web applications. I’ve also delved into web development using Django and Flask, leveraging my knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I’m comfortable working with cloud services, particularly AWS, and have experience with containerization using Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes.
I enjoy bringing people together and finding creative solutions, whether working on a small-scale project or as part of a larger team. In my free time, you can find me tinkering with new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or performing technical reviews for yet-to-be-published technical books. I’m always up for a challenge and finding new ways to improve — making a real impact.
Let’s connect and see what we can create together! You can reach me at hello.indraneel@gmail.com
